name: A Key Discovery
description:
Made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam.

A Puzzle Platformer featuring 20 levels, including a final boss.

Controls: (Keyboard/Gamepad)
Arrow keys/Directional Buttons: Move
Z Key/A Button: Jump
X Key/X Button: Pickup/Throw
R Key/Y Button: Restart Level
F4/Right Shoulder Button: Toggle Fullscreen

Uses m5x7 font by Managore (https://managore.itch.io/m5x7)
